pageContext.claim: “What they didn't discuss is this woman that came in [Natalia Veselnitskaya], who, I watched her on the ‘Today Show’ when it all started. ‘Oh, I'm just an innocent.’ Well, nobody even knows, although the halls of Congress know her very well because, for years, she’s walked around all over Congress.”
pageContext.analysis: The Mueller report does discuss Veselnitskaya, a Russian lawyer linked to the Kremlin. The special counsel investigated a meeting at Trump Tower in 2016 between Veselnitskaya and Donald Trump Jr., Jared Kushner, Paul Manafort and others, that was set up to discuss the possibility of Russia releasing "dirt" on Hillary Clinton.
